Interface FileAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface FileAPI
    Interface for the API to manage Files and Assets.

        @Deprecated
File copy(File source,
                   Folder destination,
                   boolean forceOverwrite,
                   com.liferay.portal.model.User user,
                   boolean respectFrontendRoles)
          throws DotDataException,
                 DotSecurityException
        Deprecated. 
        Copies a file to a specified folder.
        Parameters:
        source -
        destination -
        forceOverwrite - If true, will overwrite the file if already exists in the folder otherwise creates a new copy renaming the file.
        user -
        respectFrontendRoles -
        Returns:
        File
        Throws:
        DotDataException

      • saveFile

        @Deprecated
File saveFile(File file,
                       java.io.File fileData,
                       Folder folder,
                       com.liferay.portal.model.User user,
                       boolean respectFrontendRoles)
              throws DotDataException,
                     DotSecurityException
        Deprecated. 
        Saves a new file or a version of the file. If the file does not exists in the specified folder, it will create a new one. If does exists, it will be added as a new version. If this is a version and null is passed to fileDate, the underlying file from the old version will be copied to this version.
        Parameters:
        file -
        uploadedFile -
        categories -
        folder -
        user -
        respectFrontendRoles -
        Returns:
        File
        Throws:
        DotDataException
        DotSecurityException
